characterDescription:
Ka is a barmaid at the Ornery Chull, a tavern built on the leeward side of a larger stone structure in Dalinar's warcamp on the Shattered Plains.
When Peet approaches her, she's polishing a glass there, and she smiles brightly when she sees him.
When Kaladin tells Rock that he assumes she owns the place, Rock tells him that Ka is just a barmaid ... and that Peet is quite taken with her. Kaladin tells Rock that they'll need to see if she can read, because it would be good to have someone around to do that. (In a normal army, Kaladin would be lighteyed, and his wife or sister would act as the battalion's scribe and clerk.)
She offers Rock ale instead of the Horneater lager he prefers, and who thinks that ale should be a drink for women, not for large Horneater men.
Though Peet is enamored of her, Rock tells her the following:
